byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Moelis & Company said on Thursday that it has hired Steven Meehan from UBS as a managing director, specializing in health care deals worldwide.
snippet: Moelis & Company said on Thursday that it has hired Steven Meehan from UBS as a managing director, specializing in health care deals worldwide.
lead_paragraph: Moelis & Company said on Thursday that it had hired Steven Meehan from UBS as a managing director, specializing in health care deals worldwide. Mr. Meehan was most recently the chief executive of UBS's Russia and Commonwealth of Independent States operations and had also worked at Salomon Smith Barney, NatWest Securities and Drexel Burnham Lambert.

headline.main: Moelis Hires a UBS Health Care Banker
